name: Camilo Bernal Galindo
body:
### Experience:
* **2015-current | Intelliware | Software Developer**
* **2012-2013 | Red Hat | Software Engineer Intern:** Eclipse Linux Tools

### Open Source Projects:
* [**Eclipse Linux Tools:**](https://eclipse.org/linuxtools/) Full-featured C and C++ IDE support for Linux
* [**Freeseer:**](http://freeseer.readthedocs.org/en/latest/) Screencasting tool for recording and streaming presentations
* [**Pydev:**](https://github.com/cabernal/Pydev) Python IDE support for Eclipse

### Open Source Contributions:
* [**Eclipse Linux Tools:**](http://git.eclipse.org/c/linuxtools/org.eclipse.linuxtools.git/log/?qt=author&q=camilo)
    * Contributor to the Eclipse Linux Tools open source project
    * Focused on enhancing integration of C/C++ Linux profiling tools into Eclipse
    * Took part in the profiling unification effort which simplified the profiling process for end-users
    * Performed patch reviews for internal and external contributions
* [**Freeseer:**](https://github.com/Freeseer/freeseer/)
    * [Stabilized Picture-in-Picture plug-in](https://github.com/Freeseer/freeseer/commit/4c2c0b7525a9cd0233b599aad8aedb78c137c7ed)
    * [Minor fix for server UI issue](https://github.com/Freeseer/freeseer/commit/7c38b9b6cccc75e981a614ef8bf313c9371a6ecf)

### Recent Student Projects:
* **2014 | CSC490 | Capstone Design:** [Canverse](https://github.com/akbiggs/canverse)
    * Project site: http://canverse.net/
    * Minimalist live music creation application
    * Developed using the Overtone and Quil multimedia libraries for Clojure.
* **2014 | CSC443 | DB System Technology:** [Fuzzy String Search Tools](https://github.com/cabernal/CSC443/tree/master/A3)
    * Fuzzy string matching tool for large data sets, includes multiple string similarity algorithms
    * Developed in C++ using the Xapian search engine library
    * Project presentation: ["_Text search with fuzzy string matching_"](https://github.com/cabernal/CSC443/blob/master/A3/project_presentation/ProjectSlides.pdf)
* **2014 | CSC488 | Compilers and Interpreters:** [Compiler](https://github.com/mpalermo14/CSC488/tree/master/A345)
    * Student compiler, contributed to the grammar, expression semantics, code generation, testing and documentation
    * Developed using Java, JFlex and CUP

### Personal Information:
* [**CV**](https://github.com/cabernal/cabernal.me/raw/gh-pages/CamiloBernalResume.pdf)
* **E-mail:** camilobern@gmail.com
* **GitHub:** https://github.com/cabernal
* **LinkedIn:** https://ca.linkedin.com/pub/camilo-bernal/57/519/71a
